isis.stitle: FRONT DRIVE AXLE WHEEL ENDS: ROCKWELL - INSPECT

svcproc.title: INSPECT
svcproc.para: It is very important to inspect all parts carefully and completely before the axle is assembled. Check all parts for wear or stress and replace damaged parts. Replacement of damaged parts can prevent complete failure of the assembly.

step1.para: Inspect the cup, cone, rollers and cage of all tapered roller bearings in the assembly. If any of the following conditions exist, the bearing MUST be replaced ( Figure 21).

step2.para: The center of large diameter end of rollers worn level with or below the outer surface.
The radius at large diameter end of rollers worn to a sharp edge.
. A visible roller groove in the cup or cone inner race surfaces. The groove can be seen at the small or large diameter end of both parts.
Deep cracks or breaks in the cup, cone inner race or roller surfaces ( Figure 22).
Bright wear marks on the outer surface of the roller cage ( Figure 23).
Damage on rollers and on surfaces of the cup and cone inner race that touch the rollers ( Figure 24).

figure.caption: Figure 24. Bright Wear Marks on Tapered Rollers and Inner Race

step2.para: Damage on the cup and cone inner race surfaces that touch the rollers ( Figure 25).

figure.caption: Figure 25. Spalling and Flaking on Bearing Race Surfaces

step2.para: Check seals for damage. Check that seals are correctly fastened on socket. If tie rod ends have grease fittings, replace damaged seals. If tie rod ends do not have grease fittings, the complete end assembly must be replaced.

note.para: DO NOT repair tie rod ends. Damaged tie rod ends MUST be replaced.

step2.para: Check the turning torque value between the tie rod end stud and the ball cavity. If the torque value is less than five inch pounds, the tie rod end must be replaced.
Remove all dirt from housing and sleeves.
Check for cracks, loose studs and damage to machined surfaces. Repair or replace damaged parts.

step1.para: Inspect axle shafts for wear, stress, and cracks at the splines, shaft and yoke ears.
